verses.text: \w Better|strong="H2896"\w* \add is\add* the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w*, than \add he that is\add* \w perverse|strong="H6141"\w* in his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, and is a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*.

Also, \add that\add* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \add be\add* without \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \add it is\add* not \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and he that \w hasteth|strong="H0213"\w* with \add his\add* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w*.

The \w foolishness|strong="H0200"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w perverteth|strong="H5557"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: and his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w fretteth|strong="H2196"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Wealth|strong="H1952"\w* \w maketh|strong="H3254"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*; but the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* is \w separated|strong="H6504"\w* from his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*.

A \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* shall not be \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*, and \add he that\add* \w speaketh|strong="H6315"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* shall not \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*.\f + \fr 19.5 \ft unpunished: Heb. held innocent\f*

\w Many|strong="H7227"\w* will \w intreat|strong="H2470"\w* the \w favour|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w prince|strong="H5081"\w*: and every man \add is\add* a \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* to \w him|strong="H0376"\w* that giveth \w gifts|strong="H4976"\w*.\f + \fr 19.6 \ft him…: Heb. a man of gifts\f*

All the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H7326"\w* do \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* him: how much more do his \w friends|strong="H4828"\w* go \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from him? he \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w* \add them with\add* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, \add yet\add* they \add are\add* wanting \add to him\add*.

He that \w getteth|strong="H7069"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H3820"\w* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: he that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* shall \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.\f + \fr 19.8 \ft wisdom: Heb. an heart\f*

A \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* shall not be \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*, and \add he that\add* \w speaketh|strong="H6315"\w* \w lies|strong="H3577"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w Delight|strong="H8588"\w* is not \w seemly|strong="H5000"\w* for a \w fool|strong="H3684"\w*; much less for a \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to have \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.

The \w discretion|strong="H7922"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w deferreth|strong="H0748"\w* his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*; and \add it is\add* his \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* to pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* a \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*.\f + \fr 19.11 \ft discretion: or, prudence\f*

The \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2197"\w* \add is\add* as the \w roaring|strong="H5099"\w* of a \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*; but his \w favour|strong="H7522"\w* \add is\add* as \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* upon the \w grass|strong="H6212"\w*.

A \w foolish|strong="H3684"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \add is\add* the \w calamity|strong="H1942"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and the \w contentions|strong="H4079"\w* of a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add are\add* a \w continual|strong="H2956"\w* \w dropping|strong="H1812"\w*.

\w House|strong="H1004"\w* and \w riches|strong="H1952"\w* \add are\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: and a \w prudent|strong="H7919"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add is\add* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Slothfulness|strong="H6103"\w* \w casteth|strong="H5307"\w* into a deep \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w*; and an \w idle|strong="H7423"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall suffer \w hunger|strong="H7456"\w*.

He that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H4687"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; \add but\add* he that \w despiseth|strong="H0959"\w* his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

He that hath \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* upon the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w lendeth|strong="H3867"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and that which he hath \w given|strong="H1576"\w* will he pay him \w again|strong="H7999"\w*.\f + \fr 19.17 \ft that which…: or, his deed\f*

\w Chasten|strong="H3256"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* while there \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, and let not thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w spare|strong="H5375"\w* for his \w crying|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 19.18 \ft for…: or, to his destruction: or, to cause him to die\f*

A \w man|strong="H1419"\w* of \w great|strong="H1632"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* shall \w suffer|strong="H5375"\w* \w punishment|strong="H6066"\w*: for if thou \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add him\add*, yet thou must do it \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.\f + \fr 19.19 \ft do: Heb. add\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, and \w receive|strong="H6901"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*, that thou mayest be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w* in thy latter \w end|strong="H0319"\w*.

\add There are\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w devices|strong="H4284"\w* in a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; nevertheless the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that shall \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.

The \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add is\add* his \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*: and a poor \w man|strong="H7326"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H0376"\w* a \w liar|strong="H3577"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add tendeth\add* to \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: and \add he that hath it\add* shall \w abide|strong="H3885"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7649"\w*; he shall not be \w visited|strong="H6485"\w* with \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

A \w slothful|strong="H6102"\w* \add man\add* \w hideth|strong="H2934"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* in \add his\add* \w bosom|strong="H6747"\w*, and will not so much as \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* it to his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* a \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w*, and the \w simple|strong="H6612"\w* will \w beware|strong="H6191"\w*: and \w reprove|strong="H3198"\w* one that hath \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*, \add and\add* he will \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.\f + \fr 19.25 \ft will beware: Heb. will be cunning\f*

He that \w wasteth|strong="H7703"\w* \add his\add* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \add and\add* chaseth \w away|strong="H1272"\w* \add his\add* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \add is\add* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* that causeth \w shame|strong="H0954"\w*, and bringeth \w reproach|strong="H2659"\w*.

\w Cease|strong="H2308"\w*, my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w* \add that causeth\add* to \w err|strong="H7686"\w* from the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*.

An \w ungodly|strong="H1100"\w* \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w scorneth|strong="H3887"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: and the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w devoureth|strong="H1104"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*.\f + \fr 19.28 \ft An…: Heb. A witness of Belial\f*
\w Judgments|strong="H8201"\w* are \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for \w scorners|strong="H3887"\w*, and \w stripes|strong="H4112"\w* for the \w back|strong="H1460"\w* of \w fools|strong="H3684"\w*.
